section.heading: Exclusion from income for certain purposes.
section.text: Support services shall not be considered income or an asset for purposes of Chapter 2 of this title.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 8 of Career Mobility Action Plan Program Establishment Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-433, May 23, 2022, 0 DCR 0).

For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 8 of Career Mobility Action Plan Program Establishment Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-521, July 27, 2022, 69 DCR 009895).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 8 of Career Mobility Action Plan Program Establishment Temporary Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-161, Aug. 27, 2022, 69 DCR 008381).
